title: Delete enabled hashtags for a Business Account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok Business Accounts. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed value: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. You can get the ID through the open_id field returned by /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username (handle) of the Business Account.

parameters.name: hashtag
parameters.description: A hashtag to remove. To obtain a list of existing enabled hashtags for the brand, use /business/mention/hashtag/manage/list/ . Note : You can only delete hashtags that were enabled at least seven days ago. To ensure this, check the returned create_date for the hashtags from /business/mention/hashtag/manage/list/ .
